name: 无限战魂 Infinity BattleSoul
description:
• "Infinite BattleSoul"is a teamwork adventure game developed by YiLing Games featuring free collocation of "ZhanHunQi", action Roguelite, supporting 1-4 players online.
  • The development of the English version is planned in the future.

Unique ZhanHunQi

The meticulously polished ZhanHunQi system (skill props triggered by multiple conditions interlocking and nesting), dozens of different types of trigger events and effects combine to form dozens of different ZhanHunQis , With the continuous enhancement of the ZhanHunQi level, the rarity will be increased and more powerful actual combat effects will be obtained. Players can freely combine ZhanHunQi to achieve their unique "Infinity ZhanHunQi" trigger chain.

Urgent Infinity Mode

After completing the basic chapters, you will enter the endless mode. In the endless mode, as the time and the number of layers increase, the difficulty of the challenge will continue to increase, and the probability of rare items will continue to increase. Fight against the enemy, race against time, how to allocate time reasonably, whether to obtain more resources to improve yourself, or to enter the next level as fast as possible, all will be decided by you and your teammates.

Perfect Class Cooperate

Players can choose different characters to fight according to their own game habits or team needs, and they can also adjust the advanced direction of character skills to deal with various complex and changeable challenges.

Single Challenge Or Teamwork

You can be a lone ranger for a solo challenge, or you can join up to three friends in an online cooperative adventure. In a multiplayer battle, even if you are defeated, it does not mean that the game is over. As long as there is one teammate who can successfully pass the current level, you can return to the battlefield and continue to fight side by side with everyone.
